protocol.name: P-GSE62213-1
protocol.text: Partek Genomics Suite was used for data anlyses. RMA normalisation, quantile normalisation ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 normalized signal

protocol.name: P-GSE62213-2
protocol.text: plants were grown on Einheitserde (type mini tray, Fröndenberg, Germany) in growth chambers (CLF plant climatics) at constant 20°C, 55% humidity and 13 hrs light per day

protocol.name: P-GSE62213-3
protocol.text: inflorescences were flash frozen in liquid nitrogen, total RNA was isolated using NucleoSpin RNA XS kit (Machery and Nagel)

protocol.name: P-GSE62213-4
protocol.text: for each sample 1-5 µg was sent to the Integrated Functional Genomics Service at the University of Münster, Germany, which carried out probe preparation, hybridization and statistical analysis of the data The samples were amplified from 100 ng of total RNA in accordance with the Affymetrix´s protocol, fragmented and end-labeled in accordance with the Affymetrix Labeling protocol (Affymetrix UK Ltd., High Wycombe, UK).

protocol.name: P-GSE62213-5
protocol.text: The prepared targets were hybridized overnight to Affymetrix Arabidopsis GeneChip ATH1 Genome arrays. Following hybridization, the arrays were washed and stained using the Affymetrix GeneChip Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE62213-6
protocol.text: The arrays were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
